NAME: BOX
text: Mike: yo! i need some phat farm samples from the storehouse, drop them at my desk please

NAME: MOP
text: Bob: urgent! we got a super important meeting at the office, drop what you're doing rn and mop the floor before they get here!!!!!

NAME: CREATE
text: William: hey, i saw your sketches recently, really impressed by your work, maybe we could use some of your input, come to my desk

NAME: SODA
text: Greg: yo, i'm so hungover, please drop a soda at my desk

NAME: smoking_session
text: LORDNES: yo, let's rip a blunt, waiting for you near the bodega

NAME: paint
text: UNKNOWN: bro, u sure u wanna do that wack shit, carrying boxes ad alldat? there is a spot on top of the office for graffiti, let em know who they working wid
